description: Details of enhanced sound insulation values of at least 5dB above the ADE Building Regulations values, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms adjoining bathroom of separate dwelling and of at least 10dB enhancement for bedrooms above commercial premises, adjoining communal staircase and above communal kitchen/dining/living room. pursuant to condition 9 of planning application reference: 242203FUL dated 09.09.2024 for: Change of use from residential unit (Use Class C3) to HMO for 5 people (Use Class C4), single storey side extension, single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing single storey rear extension) and provision of associated refuse and cycle storage facilities.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
